external_games.name: Mystereet F: Tantei-tachi no Curtain Call
Mystereet F: Tantei-tachi no Curtain Call

name: Mystereet F: The Detectives' Curtain Call
summary: A game combining a remake of detective visual novel Mystereet: Fukagyaku Sekai no Tantei Shinshi and the brand new sequel Mystereet 2: Farewell Encounter.
